remarks: Rewrite a quantification over integers into a quantification over naturals.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.)
statement:
rexzrexnn0.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rexzrexnn0.2 $e |- ( x = -u y -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
rexzrexnn0 $p |- ( E. x e. ZZ ph <-> E. y e. NN0 ( ps \/ ch ) ) $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
